item.title: President Trump pardons Binance founder Changpeng Zhao
item.description: Zhao was sentenced to four months in prison in 2024 after pleading guilty to violating money laundering laws.

item.title: Watch: Video appears to show alleged Louvre jewel thieves escaping
item.description: Thieves stole â‚¬88m worth of French crown jewels in broad daylight on Sunday morning.

item.title: NBA injuries, x-ray poker tables and the mafia: What we know about gambling arrests
item.description: Authorities said the "mind-boggling" fraud involved tens of millions of dollars and included members of organised crime.

item.title: Ghana's former First Lady Nana Konadu Rawlings dies aged 76
item.description: She was married to Ghana's longest-serving leader Jerry John Rawlings and known for her women's rights work.

item.title: Rosenberg: Trump abandons carrot and wields stick over Putin in Ukraine talks
item.description: The BBC's Russia editor says Trump's decision to call off his Putin talks and impose oil sanctions will not go down well in Moscow.
